thread.title: BRIEF-Rank Group Says Group Like-For-Like Revenue For 13 Weeks To April 1 Declined By 2 Pct​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Rank Group Says Group Like-For-Like Revenue For 13 Weeks To April 1 Declined By 2 Pct​
text:
April 5 (Reuters) - Rank Group PLC:
* ANNOUNCES GROUP LIKE-FOR-LIKE REVENUE FOR 13 WEEKS TO 1 APRIL 2018 HAS DECLINED BY 2%​
* ‍BOARD CAUTIOUS ABOUT UK CONSUMER OUTLOOK, EXPECTS GROUP’S UK VENUES TO CONTINUE TO BE IMPACTED FOR REMAINDER OF 2017/18 FY & INTO 2018/19​
* ‍BOARD IS CAUTIOUS ABOUT UK CONSUMER OUTLOOK, EXPECTS GROUP’S UK VENUES TO CONTINUE TO BE IMPACTED FOR REMAINDER OF FY 2017/18 AND INTO 2018/19​
* ‍NOW EXPECT GROUP’S FULL YEAR OPERATING PROFIT TO BE IN RANGE OF £76M-£78M​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
